quests.desc: Your objective is to pick-up the nest of caterpillars from the floor of the cellar.
commands: unlock rectangular gate with rectangular keycard
unlock rectangular gate with rectangular keycard

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a basement. A normal kind of place. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 What's that over there? It looks like it's a trunk.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_0]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The trunk is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can make out a table. [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the table.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But the thing is empty, unfortunately. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the table.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You arrive in a studio. An ordinary kind of place.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You are in a cookery. An ordinary kind of place. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 Were you looking for a shelf? Because look over there, it's a shelf. Now why would someone leave that there? The shelf is usual.[if there is something on the s_1] On the shelf you make out [a list of things on the s_1]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But the thing is empty. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the shelf.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a pantry.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
Look at you, bigshot, walking into a vault like it isn't some huge deal.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You arrive in a spare room. A typical kind of place.

 You can make out a rack. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the rack.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if] Look over there! a counter. The counter is normal.[if there is something on the s_3] On the counter you can see [a list of things on the s_3]. Wow! Just like in the movies![end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But the thing is empty.[end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a cellar.

 You see a cabinet.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_1]. Is this it? Is this what you came to TextWorld to see? a cabinet?[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
I am sorry to announce that you are now in the parlor.

 Hey, want to see a basket? Look over there, a basket.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The basket contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a bed stand. The bed stand is usual.[if there is something on the s_4] On the bed stand you make out [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But the thing is empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
You've entered a garage.

 As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a stand. [if there is something on the s_5]On the stand you make out [a list of things on the s_5]. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You're now in a shower.

 You see a bench. [if there is something on the s_6]You see [a list of things on the s_6] on the bench.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading west. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You are in a laundromat. An ordinary kind of place. You start to take note of what's in the room.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] rectangular gate leading north. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a study. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You make out a desk. [if there is something on the s_7]You see [a list of things on the s_7] on the desk. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7]The desk appears to be empty.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the north.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
You are in a launderette.

 What's that over there? It looks like it's a dusty shelf. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. [if there is something on the s_8]On the dusty shelf you can see [a list of things on the s_8]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. Silly shelf, silly, empty, good for nothing shelf.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You are in a playroom. An usual kind of place. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You can see a chest.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] What a letdown! The chest is empty![end if] You can make out [if c_4 is locked]a locked[else if c_4 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] coffer close by.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The coffer is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a closet. An ordinary one.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] rectangular gate leading south. There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You have come into the most standard of all possible attics.

 You can see a workbench. The workbench is typical.[if there is something on the s_9] On the workbench you can make out [a list of things on the s_9]. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9] However, the workbench, like an empty workbench, has nothing on it.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: spacious basement
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a basement. A spacious one.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a bathroom.

 You can make out [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] dresser.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_5]. Classic TextWorld.[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The dresser is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You scan the room, seeing a safe.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You make out a board. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. [if there is something on the s_10]On the board you make out [a list of things on the s_10]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You've entered a scullery.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a bar. A normal kind of place.

 You make out a mantle. The mantle is standard.[if there is something on the s_11] On the mantle you can make out [a list of things on the s_11]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_11] But the thing is empty.[end if] You can make out a mantelpiece. The mantelpiece is typical.[if there is something on the s_12] On the mantelpiece you can see [a list of things on the s_12].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_12] But the thing is empty. Hopefully this doesn't make you too upset.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

walkthrough: unlock rectangular gate with rectangular keycard

objective: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! Your task for today is to lift the nest of caterpillars from the floor of the cellar.
